levels.description:
ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and only targets elite or boss enemies. The damage boosting effect of this unit's first Talent increases to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale_multiplier:0%}</> of the original
<@ba.rem>Can manually deactivate skill at will</>
